# Unity-generated files that should not be committed
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
Assets/StreamingAssets/*.tmp

# Autogenerated by Unity
sysinfo.txt

# User-specific preferences
UserSettings/

# Mono auto-generated files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta

# Builds
*.apk
*.unitypackage

# Crashlytics generated file
crashlytics-build.properties

# Uncomment if using Unity Cloud Build
# [Cc]loud/
# *.uccache

# VS Code settings
.vscode/

# Rider project files
.idea/

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/**/workspace.xml
.idea/**/tasks.xml
.idea/**/usage.statistics.xml
.idea/**/dictionaries
.idea/**/shelf
.idea/**/contentModel.xml
.idea/**/encodings.xml

# Gradle files
.gradle/
*.gradle
gradle-app.setting

# Log files
*.log

# Derived files
.DS_Store
*.swp
*.lock
